meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that atelectases can occur when the lungs do not fully expand.
meanings.sent2: The atelectases in the patient's lungs were causing breathing difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The atelectases decided to have a party in the deflated lung.
meanings.sent4: The atelectases hung over the lung like a dark cloud, blocking the air.
meanings.sent5: The image of atelectases clinging to the lung stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: Atelectases: the collapse of part or all of a lung
meanings.sent1: The atelectases in his lung were causing him discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that atelectases can lead to breathing problems.
meanings.sent3: The deflated lung felt like a deflated balloon due to the atelectases.
meanings.sent4: The atelectases were like tiny black holes sucking in the lung tissue.
meanings.sent5: The atelectases made the lung look like a crumpled paper bag.
